parameters: Thank you for opening the door.
Now we can go out any time.
The key deteriorated, and now the door
The ones who target us are no more.
Which means there were people targeting
It seems the clothes we spin have great value...
Considering the status of the city...
Well, you're monsters too, aren't you?
A species I've never heard of.
This is a Little Demon, Fiede.
Then it must've been my name.
So, can the door be left as is?
I like being able to leave whenever.
You feel dissatisfied with how you were
I know it's dangerous for us outside,
and that others are targeting us...
But it'd be better if the bad people
Ah, yeah, that sure is infuriating.
no other good way to do it...
Aren't you bad at moving around?
Rather, I'm thankful you wish to join us.
She's no powerhouse, as you can tell.
If we leave her here, I'm sure she'd
start wandering around on her own.
Besides, though they're a weak race,
things might change if they're with a group──\!
Of course, that remains to be seen.
I cannot live here with you.
Please come see us once in a while.
If you'd like, why don't you come with us?
Sorry I asked for such a strange thing.
Are you the ones who talked to me?
We found the key and opened the door.
I wanted to go see, but walking
No, you were protected here all this time?
